title: The Holmes Manual (gnv64)
description:
The Holmes Manual 
by Mike Holmes
Harper | January 2015 | ISBN-10: 0062367773 | ePUB | 50.3 mb

The Holmes Manual offers a unique troubleshooting guide and instruction manual for America's homeowners:
- Why are my windows fogging up?
- What can I do about a squeaky floor?
- Why is my bedroom so much colder than the rest of the house?
- Are tankless water heaters worth the money?

From top to bottom, outside to inside, Mike answers homeowners' most common questions and provides solutions for everyday problems. Mike also offers trusted advice on maintenance - including instructions for repairs and projects that homeowners can tackle themselves. Packed with color photographs, handy tips and sidebars, The Holmes Manual is a must-have guide for every homeowner.

About the Author
Mike Holmes has over 20 years of experience in all aspects of construction and home renovation. He has worked on hundreds of building and renovation projects, earning a reputation for outstanding craftsmanship and a willingness to stand behind his work. The author of Make It Right and The Holmes Inspection, Mike is also the star of the television shows Holmes on Homes, Holmes Inspection and Holmes Makes It Right.

CONTENTS
Introduction
1 Exteriors and Attics
2 Windows. Doors, Walls, and Floors
3 Lighting. Electrical, and Plumbing
4 Kitchens and Bathrooms
5 Heating, Ventilation, Cooling, and Insulation
6 Basements and Foundations
7 Materials and Finishes
8 Household Hazards and Pests Acknowledgements
About the Author 
Copyright
About the Publisher

NOTE: There appears to be some anomaly in the structure of this ePUB. It does not open with Adobe digital editions & has some problems with Calibre. But opens fine with Sumatra reader. Just letting you know so that you don't blame me as I am not a maker of this ePUB!
